last_episode_to_air.name: Ashes
last_episode_to_air.overview: As the friends face the aftermath of a harrowing night, Lisi navigates a tricky situation — and comes to a startling realization about the past.

name: Kitz
overview: Seeking revenge on the girl she blames for her brother's death, a Kitzbühel waitress infiltrates the glitzy world of a group of wealthy Munich teens.

episodes.name: Countdown
episodes.overview: On New Year's Eve, Lisi works at a posh party hosted by Vanessa, the rich girl she holds responsible for her brother's tragic death a year earlier.

episodes.name: Mousetrap
episodes.overview: At a champagne-soaked brunch, Lisi learns a scandalous secret — and scores an invite for a spa day. Kosh tries to get back into Vanessa's good graces.

episodes.name: Off Track
episodes.overview: Lisi goes to a snowy photo shoot with Vanessa. Dominik faces pressure to figure out his future. On a downward spiral, Kosh winds up at Hans' farm.

episodes.name: Thaw
episodes.overview: Lisi tricks Vanessa into filming an angry rant for a fake audition. With Hans' support, Kosh vows to change his ways. Dominik and Lisi grow closer.

episodes.name: Avalanches
episodes.overview: Reeling from revelations about his family, Hans urges Lisi to leak the video. Tensions erupt at Regine's fashion show — with explosive consequences.

episodes.name: Ashes
episodes.overview: As the friends face the aftermath of a harrowing night, Lisi navigates a tricky situation — and comes to a startling realization about the past.
